turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to order three medium pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like on your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like one plain cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One with extra cheese, and one Veggie Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering 3 medium pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 extra cheese, and 1 veggie lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and they need to be gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your delivery will be coming in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order 2 L of soda, also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can add that to your order, your new total is $61, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i have added that to your order, can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, goodbye.
